meanings.definition: A chain of amino acids linked by peptide bonds.
meanings.sent1: The polypeptide formed in the lab was made up of many amino acids.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study how polypeptides are formed in living organisms.
meanings.sent3: The polypeptide walked into the amino acid party and everyone cheered.
meanings.sent4: The polypeptide chain was like a string of beads, each amino acid a different color.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the polypeptide structure looked like a tiny, interconnected chain.

meanings.definition: A molecule consisting of multiple amino acids bonded together.
meanings.sent1: The polypeptide in the cell plays a crucial role in protein synthesis.
meanings.sent2: Food contains various polypeptides that our bodies break down for energy.
meanings.sent3: The polypeptide molecule and the amino acids danced together in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent4: Her love for science was like a complex polypeptide, made up of many different elements.
meanings.sent5: The polypeptide structure was so intricate, it resembled a tangled web of amino acids.
